name: Computer Science
long_description: This comprehensive course covers programming languages, algorithms, and computer systems. Learn to develop software applications and gain skills in areas like web development, artificial intelligence, and cybersecurity.

name: Business Administration
long_description: Explore the world of business with courses in marketing, finance, and management. Acquire the knowledge and skills to start your own business or excel in a leadership role within an organization.

name: Medicine
long_description: Embark on a journey in healthcare with courses in anatomy, physiology, pharmacology, and clinical training. Prepare to become a medical doctor or healthcare professional.

name: Engineering
long_description: Choose from various engineering disciplines, such as electrical, mechanical, civil, or computer engineering. Develop the skills to design, build, and maintain complex systems and structures.

name: Psychology
short_description: Explore the human mind and behavior
long_description: Delve into the fascinating world of psychology. Study cognitive psychology, clinical psychology, and social psychology to understand the complexities of human behavior, emotions, and mental health.

name: Environmental Science
long_description: Become an advocate for the environment with courses in ecology, climate change, conservation, and environmental policy. Learn to address pressing environmental challenges and work towards a sustainable future.
